stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: IP Addresses and Malicious Files Associated with Healthcare Breach
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 01 February 2015, IP addresses from a breach of a healthcare organization were identified connecting to and transferring sensitive data to the domain sharefile.com. A variant of the pwdump password hash extraction tool was also identified.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: This IP address was observed moving sensitive data to the domain sharefile.com. This IP also hosted an FTP server that was used to download post exploitation tools including dump32.exe (MD5: 59c311a7299ed0b71ed0035f8f526ad6), which is a pwdump variant.
This file is a pwdump variant. Pwdump is used to extract password hashes from the Windows registry/SAM file.
This IP address was observed connecting to the location on the domain sharefile.com where the sensitive data was stored.
